queries: Apple reported EPS of $1.52. P/E ratio stands at 28.
Our DCF model uses WACC of 8.5% and projects FCF growth of 12%.
The PE firm invested $500M in the IPO
EBITDA increased YoY by 15% while ROIC exceeded WACC
Q1 FY2024 results show strong ROE and ROA performance
SEC filing indicates SOX compliance with GAAP standards
Balance sheet shows A/R up 20%, A/P stable, COGS decreased
M&A activity driven by VC and PE firms targeting high-growth IPOs
NPV analysis using CAPM shows IRR above hurdle rate
Compare P/B, P/S, and EV/EBITDA ratios across peers

test_pairs.description: Financial synonyms should have high similarity
Unrelated concepts should have low similarity
Acronym and expansion should be nearly identical
